Interface SharingDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
PostgresSharingDAO
public interface SharingDAO

Manages the fundamental Database operations for the sharing of ToDo between system users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    int
    getSharedNoticeboardsMetadataByUserID(int userID, List<Noticeboard> boards)
    Gets the metadata of the Noticeboards shared with a User.
    int
    loadSharedNoticeboardsByUserID(int userID, List<Noticeboard> boards)
    Loads a User's shared ToDos in each appropriate Noticeboard.
    void
    shareToDo(int userID, int todoID)
    Shares a ToDo with a User.
    void
    unshareToDo(int userID, int todoID)
    Unshares a ToDo with a User.

  • Method Details

    • loadSharedNoticeboardsByUserID

      int loadSharedNoticeboardsByUserID(int userID, List<Noticeboard> boards)

      Loads a User's shared ToDos in each appropriate Noticeboard.

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      boards - a List object to load the Noticeboard objects into
      Returns:
      0 if successful, otherwise -1.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if boards==null

    • getSharedNoticeboardsMetadataByUserID

      int getSharedNoticeboardsMetadataByUserID(int userID, List<Noticeboard> boards)

      Gets the metadata of the Noticeboards shared with a User.

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      boards - a List object to load the Noticeboard objects into
      Returns:
      0 if successful, otherwise -1.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if boards==null

    • shareToDo

      void shareToDo(int userID, int todoID)

      Shares a ToDo with a User.

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      todoID - the ToDo's ID
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if either the User or the ToDo do not exist
      IllegalStateException - if the ToDo is already shared with the User
      IllegalArgumentException - if the User is trying to share with itself a ToDo it owns

    • unshareToDo

      void unshareToDo(int userID, int todoID)

      Unshares a ToDo with a User.

      Parameters:
      userID - the User's ID
      todoID - the ToDo's ID
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the User does not exist or if the ToDo is not shared with the User
